select a.ORDER_ID, b.TASK_TYPE_NAME, c.TASK_INFO_VALUE as publish_code, g.TASK_INFO_VALUE as change_time, g1.TASK_INFO_VALUE as issue_date, g2.TASK_INFO_VALUE as change_content, g3.TASK_INFO_VALUE as production_line, g4.TASK_INFO_VALUE as car_type, g5.TASK_INFO_VALUE as mounting_mat, a.ORDER_STATE_CODE, DATE_FORMAT(a.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') as create_time, e.USER_NAME as create_user, a.IS_DELAY, a.invalidate_text, DATE_FORMAT(a.REAL_COMPLETE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') as complete_time, DATE_FORMAT(a.REQUIRE_COMPLETE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') as require_complete_time, f.cycle_id, f.is_notice, f.is_alarm, f.is_delay as cycle_is_delay, f.notice_cycle, f.alarm_time, f.delay_cycle, h.org_name as create_org from task_order a left join task_type b on a.TASK_TYPE_ID = b.TASK_TYPE_ID left join task_order_info c on c.ORDER_ID = a.ORDER_ID and c.TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_users e on a.CREATE_USER_ID = e.USER_ID left join task_notice_cycle f on f.cycle_id = a.cycle_id left join task_order_info g on g.ORDER_ID = a.ORDER_ID and g.TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID = 11 left join sys_org h on e.org_id = h.org_id left join task_order_info g1 on g1.ORDER_ID = a.ORDER_ID and g1.TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID = 10 left join task_order_info g2 on g2.ORDER_ID = a.ORDER_ID and g2.TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID = 9 left join task_order_info g3 on g3.ORDER_ID = a.ORDER_ID and g3.TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID = 2 left join task_order_info g4 on g4.ORDER_ID = a.ORDER_ID and g4.TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID = 3 left join task_order_info g5 on g5.ORDER_ID = a.ORDER_ID and g5.TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID = 4 left join task_order_info g11 on g11.ORDER_ID = a.ORDER_ID and g11.TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID = 11
not exists(select 1 from agreement_manage t where t.order_id = a.ORDER_ID and (STRCMP(t.agreement_state, '10B') = 0 or STRCMP(t.agreement_state, '10C') = 0)) and STRCMP(a.contract_state, '10B') = 0 and a.contract_user is null and a.delete_state = 0 and exists(SELECT 1 FROM task_wo_order two, task_wo_order_sys_info twosi, sys_info info WHERE two.`WO_ORDER_ID` = twosi.`WO_ORDER_ID` AND twosi.`SYS_INFO_ID` = info.`sys_info_id` AND twosi.`WO_INFO_VALUE` = 1 AND info.`agreement_flag` = 1 AND two.`ORDER_ID` = a.order_id)
and TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(g11.TASK_INFO_VALUE) <= 7 and c.TASK_INFO_VALUE like CONCAT('%',#{publishCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and g.TASK_INFO_VALUE like CONCAT(#{changeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by c.TASK_INFO_VALUE asc

select count(1) from task_order a left join task_type b on a.TASK_TYPE_ID = b.TASK_TYPE_ID left join task_order_info c on c.ORDER_ID = a.ORDER_ID and c.TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_users e on a.CREATE_USER_ID = e.USER_ID left join task_notice_cycle f on f.cycle_id = a.cycle_id left join task_order_info g on g.ORDER_ID = a.ORDER_ID and g.TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID = 11 left join sys_org h on e.org_id = h.org_id left join task_order_info g1 on g1.ORDER_ID = a.ORDER_ID and g1.TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID = 10 left join task_order_info g2 on g2.ORDER_ID = a.ORDER_ID and g2.TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID = 9 left join task_order_info g3 on g3.ORDER_ID = a.ORDER_ID and g3.TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID = 2 left join task_order_info g4 on g4.ORDER_ID = a.ORDER_ID and g4.TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID = 3 left join task_order_info g5 on g5.ORDER_ID = a.ORDER_ID and g5.TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID = 4 left join task_order_info g11 on g11.ORDER_ID = a.ORDER_ID and g11.TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID = 11
not exists(select 1 from agreement_manage t where t.order_id = a.ORDER_ID and (STRCMP(t.agreement_state, '10B') = 0 or STRCMP(t.agreement_state, '10C') = 0)) and STRCMP(a.contract_state, '10B') = 0 and a.contract_user is null and a.delete_state = 0 and exists(SELECT 1 FROM task_wo_order two, task_wo_order_sys_info twosi, sys_info info WHERE two.`WO_ORDER_ID` = twosi.`WO_ORDER_ID` AND twosi.`SYS_INFO_ID` = info.`sys_info_id` AND twosi.`WO_INFO_VALUE` = 1 AND info.`agreement_flag` = 1 AND two.`ORDER_ID` = a.order_id)
and TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(g11.TASK_INFO_VALUE) <= 7 and c.TASK_INFO_VALUE like CONCAT('%',#{publishCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and g.TASK_INFO_VALUE like CONCAT(#{changeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
